```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(medicaldata)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
covid_testing
```

```{r}
covid <- covid_testing %>% 
  filter(test_id == "covid") %>% 
  mutate(result = str_to_title(result))
covid
```


```{r}
covid_summary <- covid %>% 
  group_by(pan_day) %>% 
  summarise(percent_positive = sum(result == "Positive")/length(result))
covid_summary
```
```{r}
```{r}
covid_ages <- covid %>% 
  filter(result == "Positive") %>% 
  mutate(AgeGroup = case_when(
    age >= 0  & age < 10 ~ '0-10',
    age >= 11 & age < 20 ~ '11-20',
    age >= 21 & age < 30 ~ '21-30',
    age >= 31 & age < 40 ~ '31-40',
    age >= 41 & age < 50 ~ '41-50',
    age >= 51 & age < 60 ~ '51-60',
    age >= 61 ~ '61+')
    )
covid_ages
```
